headline: Dave & Buster's Unveils Exclusive UFC Challenge Game, Deepening UFC Partnership
summary: Dave & Buster's, the ultimate destination to eat, drink, play, and watch sporting events, is taking its partnership with UFC to the next level with the launch of the UFC Challenge game. Available now at Dave & Buster's locations nationwide, this high-energy interactive game is set to amplify the fight-night experience, further establishing Dave & Buster's as a premier destination to watch every UFC fight.
